title: Tech Update
description: An interactive and responsive blogging platform where logged-in users can create, update, and manage posts, while unregistered users can only view existing content. Designed with a clean UI to ensure seamless content browsing and management.

title: Trendbe (E-commerce)
description: Developed a responsive Admin Dashboard with real-time updates for managing products, users, and transactions. Designed interactive analytics and a product catalog with search, filtering, and shopping cart functionality.

title: Dice Game
description: The Dice Game is a simple and fun number guessing game built to test your luck.
